table.caption: Table 274 — Entries for specific types of requirements
head: Key
Type
Description
rows: (Required, if the S key has the value Encryption: PDF 2.0) An encryption dictionary ("Table 20 — Entries common to all encryption dictionaries") that defines all of the relevant aspects of the encryption method needed to process the document.

(Optional, but only used when the S key has the value of DigSig, DigSigValidation or DigSigMDP; PDF 2.0) A signature dictionary ("Table 255 — Entries in a signature dictionary") that defines all of the relevant aspects that are needed in order to process the digital signature requirements.
